Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Requires public libraries to carry opioid antagonists and requires training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires public libraries to carry opioid antagonists and requires training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring public libraries to carry opioid antagonists and to require training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists
